message.content:
cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the security challenges posed by Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) in Cyber-Physical Systems (CPSs), which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper proposes a dynamic game framework to model the interaction between the attacker and defender, which involves strategic decision-making and learning, indicating the relevance of game theory (cs.GT) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also mentions the use of iterative algorithms to compute the solution concept of Perfect Bayesian Nash Equilibrium (PBNE), which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and software engineering (cs.SE).
